question: Is your journal National or International?
answer: The journal is an International Journal.

question: What is the frequency of publication?
answer: The Journal is published SIX times in a year that is bi-monthly journal.

question: Who is the publisher of the Journal?
answer: Eswar Publications from Udumalpet,Tamil Nadu, India.

question: In which year the journal was started?
answer: The journal was first published in the 2009.

question: What is publication cost?
answer: We are not collecting any kind of fees from the authors directly or indirectly. There is no article processing fee, reviewing fee, maintenance fee etc. It is completely free.

question: How many days have to wait for the completion of review process?
answer: The papers submitted by the authors are forwarded to the reviewers for blind review process. The time for completion of review process is not always same, but at the maximum within one month we will be able to finish the review. `

question: Does the articles are having unique DOI?
answer: Yes. All the articles published in the journal is having unique DOI. The DOI of journal is DOI:10.35444/IJANA

question: Is it open access journal?
answer: Yes. The journal is an open access.

question: Is there any last date for paper submission?
answer: No. There is no last date for paper submission. Authors can submit their paper though the year, since publication process is a continuous process.

question: How to submit my research paper?
answer: Authors can submit their unpublished / submitted elsewhere by online or send directly to the e-mail id : editor.ijana@gmail.com

question: How do I know the status of the submitted paper?
answer: All the submitted papers are sent to the reviewers for reviewing the quality of the paper and once the process is completed, we will inform to the authors by mail immediately

question: Is there any copyright form?
answer: Yes. All the authors of the accepted papers have to send the duly signed copyright form.
